guides.title: Capture HTTP Traffic
guides.description: Capture HTTP packets on a specific interface.
guides.explanation: Captures TCP traffic on port 80 (HTTP) on the eth0 interface.

guides.title: Filter DNS Queries
guides.explanation: Captures UDP traffic on port 53 (DNS) on the eth0 interface.

guides.title: Save Captured Packets
guides.description: Save captured packets to a file.
guides.explanation: Uses tshark (Wireshark's CLI) to save packets to capture.pcap.

guides.title: Analyze HTTPS Traffic
guides.description: Filter HTTPS traffic on a specific port.
guides.explanation: Captures TCP traffic on port 443 (HTTPS) on the eth0 interface.

guides.title: Display Packet Details
guides.description: View detailed packet information in Wireshark GUI.
guides.explanation: Opens a saved capture file in Wireshark for detailed analysis.
